mapper.insert: insert into users (uid, user_name, user_email, user_password, user_phone, dog_size, enabled, authority) values (#{uid},#{user_name},#{user_email},#{user_password},#{user_phone},#{dog_size},1,'ROLE_USER')
mapper.select: select uid, uname, uemail, upassword, uphone from users where uid=#{uid}
select uid, uname, uemail from users where uid=#{uid}
select user_email from users where uid=#{uid}
select user_password from users where uid=#{uid}
